actions.command: execute if entity @s[tag=eagle] as @a if score @s blessed = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest] blessed run resource set @s hypno:playstyle/hephaestus/cherubim/blessings_eagle 0
execute if entity @s[tag=eagle] as @a if score @s blessed = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest] blessed run resource set @s hypno:playstyle/hephaestus/cherubim/blessings_ox 0
execute if entity @s[tag=eagle] as @a if score @s blessed = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest] blessed run resource set @s hypno:playstyle/hephaestus/cherubim/blessings_lion 0

condition.command: execute as @e[distance=..5,type=!minecraft:armor_stand] if score @s blessed = @e[limit=1,sort=nearest] blessed
